name: MARSHAL IN HELL - Demo
description:
MARSHAL IN HELL is a Fast Paced Shooter where you play as A Marshal who was killed in the battlefield and is trying to get Re-Incarnated.


SYNOPSIS

YOU ARE DEAD. But you are not ready to give up just yet. You made a deal to slay the devil and be Reincarnated in this fast paced RPG shooter.

PLOT

You have to proceed along all the difficulties ,fighting against evil spirits , endeavoring to destroy the notorious "BhosdaMon - The Human Slayer" that is causing all sorts of troubles in all the realms and you have the task to kill this Devil and be Re-Incarnated Again in the battlefield giving you one more chance to turn the Battle in your favor.

FEATURES
  • MARSHAL IN HELL is a Fast Paced RPG shooter with a shoulder camera perspective which makes sure players are always close to action.
  • You have a Big Arsenal of Unique and lethal weapons at your disposal.
  • Explore Various Worlds filled to the brim with Platforming challenges combat encounters collectibles and many more.
  • Engaging gameplay with unique combat abilities to destroy your enemies.
